channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress left in front garden for over a month, 9th July
item.description:
There is a mattress and abandoned furniture left in this garden for over a month. Can it be removed please? Very unsightly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meynell Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Suspicious van parking for several days with covered rear number plate, 9th July
item.description:
This van has parked here a few times in the last couple of weeks. Don’t believe it is local. It used to be a Sainsbury’s van but the decals have been removed. It keeps wrapping rags over its rear number plate seemingly to try to hide it. Seems suspicious.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meynell Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bus lane road works, 9th July
item.description:
No road markings on bend causing traffic to have near misses.bus lane markings in place and road signs informing of a bus lane when the bus lane is not in operation.The work has not been completed it’s a total mess and is putting road users at risk and pedestrians and cyclists these works have made the road dangerous with multiple hazards .

item.title: Uneven and broken paving causing a trip hazard, 9th July
item.description:
My 79 year old mother tripped on uneven and raised paving on the 3rd July, causing her to fall on the pavement, sustaining injuries to her face, arm, hand and knees. I understand that whilst surrounding pavements have been repaved over the years, Bourne Road has not. The large paving slabs in situ are broken in places and displaced causing trip hazards to the elderly. We are aware of others who have sustained similar falls. Falls of this nature by the elderly can prove fatal, please inspect and repair to stop others from being at risk. In addition to the injuries sustained it has sadly left my mother, a previously strongly independent lady, experiencing a complete loss of confidence and being frightened to go out unaccompanied.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
